page.title: 02 ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: THE LARGEST CENTRE FOR ENTERTAINMENT IN GRAVESEND IS THE WOODVILLE HALLS ATTACHED TO THE CIVIC CENTRE.IT HOSTS PROFESSIONAL CONCERTS,PLAYS AND WRESTLING AS WELL AS LOCAL OPERATICS,SCHOOL CONCERTS,DANCES AND AEROBICS AND EXHIBITIONS.EVERY SCHOOL HOLIDAY THERE IS A CHILDRENS ENTERTAINMENT,AND A PANTOMINE AT CHRISTMAS.THE VICTORIA CENTRE AND ST.ANDREWS ART CENTRES HOLD POETRY READINGS,ART EXHIBITIONS AND CONCERTS TOO.ON THE PROMENADE BY THE RIVER THAMES THERE IS A ANNUAL EDWARDIAN FAIR ,SEVERAL REGATTAS AND A TOWN CARNIVAL.AT THE FORT GARDENS AND WOODLANDS PARK THERE ARE OFTEN TRAVELING CIRCUSES OR FUN FAIRS.THERE IS A CINEMAS WITH 3 SCREENS SHOWING A WIDE RANGE OF FILMS.
